channel.title: Payment batching on ₿itcoin Transcripts

item.title: Enterprise Wallets/UTXO Management
item.description: Mark Erhardt: 00:00:00 Just to throw out a few numbers there, non-SegWit inputs cost almost 300 bytes, and native SegWit inputs cost slightly more than 100 bytes. There’s almost a reduction by two-thirds in fees if you switch from non-SegWit to native SegWit. Introduction Caralie Chrisco: 00:00:29 Hi, everyone, welcome to the Chaincode podcast. My name is Caralie. Adam Jonas: 00:00:32 And it’s Jonas. Caralie Chrisco: 00:00:33 And we’re back!
